title: Backend development
description: I started with backend development in Node.js by the age of 16. It's one of my favorite disciplines in software development space.

I have experience in software testing, building REST APIs, writing well structured backend code, etc,.. Since I started I've developed 4 backend apps, that expose REST APIs, communicate with database and other external services,..

title: Web Development
description: I've developed many web apps mostly in vanilla JS and React.js.

title: Mobile development
description: I started mobile development in 2018. Since then I developed several React Native apps.

title: Film making
description: I was a very passionate film maker back in primary school and at the beginning of high school. I professionally filmed 3 weddings and helped edited a movie that screened in our local theater 3 times.

title: Photography
description: I do photography mostly for fun in my free time or when I go on trips.
